title: Letting in the jungle
brief_description: A visit to Kolmarden Zoological Park in Sweden where wild animals from all over the world live free in surroundings reminiscent of a national park. Includes a sequence depicting Siberian tigers at play in the snow. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
